item.title: All Things Work Together for Good
item.description:
All Things Work Together for Good by Elder James B. Martino, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 180th Annual General Conference on Wed Mar 31 2010
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder James B. Martino, Of the Seventy

item.title: Turn to Him and Answers Will Come
item.description:
Turn to Him and Answers Will Come by Elder James B. Martino, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 185th Semiannual General Conference on Wed Sep 30 2015
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
